title: The Patdown Bonus Episode - Live on Stereo
description:
The Patdown is LIVE on the Stereo app and answering listener questions. Be sure to join the Stereo app and follow Ms. Pat, Chris and Deon for the next live episode and to be part of the show.

https://stereo.com/comediennemspat
https://stereo.com/brightfame4
https://stereo.com/chrisspangle
